alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 24 at 4:05AM MDT until October 25 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 33 could result in frost formation this morning. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23 possible tonight into Tuesday morning. * WHERE...Eastern Fremont, Pueblo, Crowley and Otero Counties. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, until 9 AM MDT this morning. For the Freeze Watch, from late tonight through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
